data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Describe a time when you surprised a friend or family member. How did the person react to your surprise? How did it impact your relationship with that person?
data.answer: The last time when I surprised a friend was two weeks ago. She really wanted to try virtual reality games, but it was not very easy to find. Eventually, I found a place that runs this type of gaming experience and took my friend there to try. She was so surprised and happy. She even initiated to pay for my lunch as a way of showing her appreciation. As a result, she started to appreciate me more and our friendship becomes stronger and closer.
